title: Brain Behind Storyvord
bio: With 12+ years of global experience in film and video production, Gaurav has contributed to blockbuster projects like Fast & Furious 7 and The Crown. A visionary entrepreneur, he previously founded CamArt, a leading film equipment rental portal for international producers. Armed with an MBA in International Business (UK) and business certifications from Harvard University, Gaurav brings unmatched expertise to revolutionize filmmaking with AI.
name: Gaurav Sharma
